title: Upon touchdown, page 1 of the LANDING summary will be displa…
caption_en: Upon touchdown, page 1 of the LANDING summary will be displayed automatically. Information on this page is self-explanatory. oo FR N _

title: Landing page 22 will display the best computed position coor…
caption_en: Landing page 22 will display the best computed position coordinates, the most significant sensors derived position co-ordinates, and the difference between the two. J oo FR N _
